description:
'Please break the... engagement... Please...'


Crying and begging to her fiancee, the first prince of the Wilhelm Kingdom, Leonhardt Wilhelm, was the daughter of the Duke of Vanfleet, Lucia.


This is the story of a Duke's daughter who recalled her memory of her past life at the sight of her fiance the prince dancing with the daughter of a Count, wanting to cancel the engagement, but was captured by the prince instead.>
